      java.util.Set<Var> AdoptAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the selector and the goal, i.e., Update, to be adopted by this AdoptAction.
      java.util.Set<Var> DeleteAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the selector of this action and the Update that is to be removed from the BeliefBase by this DeleteAction as well as the variables that occur in the update that is to be performed on the mail box.
      java.util.Set<Var> DropAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the selector and the goal, i.e., Update, to be dropped by this DropAction.
      java.util.Set<Var> ExitModuleAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables of this ExitModuleAction.
      java.util.Set<Var> InsertAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the Update to be inserted into the BeliefBase by this InsertAction as well as the variables that occur in the update that is to be performed on the mail box.
      java.util.Set<Var> LogAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the argument of this LogAction.
      java.util.Set<Var> ModuleCallAction.getFreeVar() 
      java.util.Set<Var> PrintAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the argument of this PrintAction.
      java.util.Set<Var> SendAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the content of the message to be sent by this SendAction and the selector of this action.
      java.util.Set<Var> UserSpecAction.getFreeVar()
      Returns the (free) variables that occur in the parameters of this UserSpecAction.
      java.util.Set<Var> UserSpecOrModuleCall.getFreeVar()
      Returns the free variables in the parameters of this UserSpecOrModuleCall.
